author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux to acquire machinery equipment from Japan's Ulvac
text:
Sept 23 Innolux Corp
* Says to acquire machinery assets worth T$995 million ($30.31 million)
Source text on Eikon:
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.8320 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
